original_metadata.note: This is demo data based on real AFCON 2025 information for testing purposes

documents.text:
Article: Morocco Opens AFCON 2025 with Victory Over Comoros
Date: 2025-12-21
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: match_result

Contenu:
Morocco kicked off the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations with a commanding 2-0 victory over Comoros at Prince Moulay Abdellah Stadium. Brahim Díaz opened the scoring in the 55th minute, with Ayoub El Kaabi doubling the lead in the 74th minute. The Atlas Lions dominated possession and showcased their attacking prowess in front of 60,180 fans in Rabat.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, Morocco, Comoros, Group A, Brahim Díaz, El Kaabi

metadata.title: Morocco Opens AFCON 2025 with Victory Over Comoros

documents.original_content: Morocco kicked off the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations with a commanding 2-0 victory over Comoros at Prince Moulay Abdellah Stadium. Brahim Díaz opened the scoring in the 55th minute, with Ayoub El Kaabi doubling the lead in the 74th minute. The Atlas Lions dominated possession and showcased their attacking prowess in front of 60,180 fans in Rabat.

documents.text:
Article: Egypt Defeats Zimbabwe 2-1 in Thrilling Group B Encounter
Date: 2025-12-22
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: match_result

Contenu:
Mohamed Salah scored a crucial late penalty as Egypt came from behind to beat Zimbabwe 2-1 at Adrar Stadium in Agadir. Prince Dube gave Zimbabwe the lead in the 20th minute, but Omar Marmoush equalized in the 64th minute before Salah's penalty in stoppage time secured all three points for the Pharaohs.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, Egypt, Zimbabwe, Mohamed Salah, Group B

metadata.title: Egypt Defeats Zimbabwe 2-1 in Thrilling Group B Encounter

documents.original_content: Mohamed Salah scored a crucial late penalty as Egypt came from behind to beat Zimbabwe 2-1 at Adrar Stadium in Agadir. Prince Dube gave Zimbabwe the lead in the 20th minute, but Omar Marmoush equalized in the 64th minute before Salah's penalty in stoppage time secured all three points for the Pharaohs.

documents.text:
Article: Nigeria Dominates Tunisia 3-2 in Group C Thriller
Date: 2025-12-27
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: match_result

Contenu:
Nigeria showcased their attacking prowess with a 3-2 victory over Tunisia at Fez Stadium. Victor Osimhen, Wilfred Ndidi, and Ademola Lookman scored for the Super Eagles, who demonstrated why they're among the tournament favorites. Tunisia fought back bravely but couldn't overcome Nigeria's quality.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, Nigeria, Tunisia, Group C, Osimhen, Lookman

metadata.title: Nigeria Dominates Tunisia 3-2 in Group C Thriller

documents.original_content: Nigeria showcased their attacking prowess with a 3-2 victory over Tunisia at Fez Stadium. Tunisia fought back bravely but couldn't overcome Nigeria's quality.

documents.text:
Article: Senegal and DR Congo Play Out 1-1 Draw in Group D
Date: 2025-12-27
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: match_result

Contenu:
Senegal and DR Congo shared the spoils in an entertaining 1-1 draw at Tangier Grand Stadium. Sadio Mané scored for Senegal in the 69th minute, but Cédric Bakambu equalized for DR Congo just eight minutes later. Both teams remain strong contenders to progress from Group D.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, Senegal, DR Congo, Sadio Mané, Group D

metadata.title: Senegal and DR Congo Play Out 1-1 Draw in Group D

documents.original_content: Senegal and DR Congo shared the spoils in an entertaining 1-1 draw at Tangier Grand Stadium. Sadio Mané scored for Senegal in the 69th minute, but Cédric Bakambu equalized for DR Congo just eight minutes later. Both teams remain strong contenders to progress from Group D.

documents.text:
Article: Algeria Tops Group E with Perfect Record
Date: 2025-12-31
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: match_result

Contenu:
Algeria secured their place at the top of Group E with a commanding 3-1 victory over Equatorial Guinea. Riyad Mahrez was the star of the show, contributing to all three goals. The Desert Foxes have won all three group games and look like genuine title contenders.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, Algeria, Mahrez, Group E, Equatorial Guinea

metadata.title: Algeria Tops Group E with Perfect Record

documents.original_content: Algeria secured their place at the top of Group E with a commanding 3-1 victory over Equatorial Guinea. Riyad Mahrez was the star of the show, contributing to all three goals. The Desert Foxes have won all three group games and look like genuine title contenders.

documents.text:
Article: Ivory Coast Defeats Gabon 3-2 in Group F Thriller
Date: 2025-12-31
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: match_result

Contenu:
The defending champions Ivory Coast came from behind twice to beat Gabon 3-2 in a thrilling Group F encounter at Marrakesh Stadium. Gabon's Denis Bouanga and Guélor Kanga had given them a 2-1 lead, but late goals from Evann Guessand and Bazoumana Touré secured victory for Les Éléphants.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, Ivory Coast, Gabon, defending champions, Group F

metadata.title: Ivory Coast Defeats Gabon 3-2 in Group F Thriller

documents.original_content: The defending champions Ivory Coast came from behind twice to beat Gabon 3-2 in a thrilling Group F encounter at Marrakesh Stadium. Gabon's Denis Bouanga and Guélor Kanga had given them a 2-1 lead, but late goals from Evann Guessand and Bazoumana Touré secured victory for Les Éléphants.

documents.text:
Article: Morocco Prepares for Round of 16 Against Tanzania
Date: 2026-01-01
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: match_preview

Contenu:
Host nation Morocco will face Tanzania in the Round of 16 at Prince Moulay Abdellah Stadium on January 4th. The Atlas Lions topped Group A with 7 points and will be looking to continue their impressive run in front of their home fans. Tanzania qualified as one of the best third-placed teams.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, Morocco, Tanzania, Round of 16, knockout

metadata.title: Morocco Prepares for Round of 16 Against Tanzania

The Atlas Lions topped Group A with 7 points and will be looking to continue their impressive run in front of their home fans. Tanzania qualified as one of the best third-placed teams.

documents.text:
Article: CAF Announces Match Officials for AFCON 2025 Knockout Stage
Date: 2026-01-01
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: tournament_news

Contenu:
The Confederation of African Football has announced the list of match officials who will oversee the knockout stage matches of the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations. The selection includes 28 referees and 31 assistant referees from across the continent, ensuring the highest standards of officiating.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, match officials, referees, knockout stage

metadata.title: CAF Announces Match Officials for AFCON 2025 Knockout Stage

documents.original_content: The Confederation of African Football has announced the list of match officials who will oversee the knockout stage matches of the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations. The selection includes 28 referees and 31 assistant referees from across the continent, ensuring the highest standards of officiating.

documents.text:
Article: Record Attendance at Tangier Grand Stadium
Date: 2025-12-27
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: tournament_news

Contenu:
The Tangier Grand Stadium set a new attendance record for the tournament with 75,000 fans packing the venue for the Group D match between Senegal and DR Congo. The passionate atmosphere showcased the Moroccan fans' love for African football and created an unforgettable experience.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, attendance, Tangier, stadium, fans

metadata.title: Record Attendance at Tangier Grand Stadium

documents.original_content: The Tangier Grand Stadium set a new attendance record for the tournament with 75,000 fans packing the venue for the Group D match between Senegal and DR Congo. The passionate atmosphere showcased the Moroccan fans' love for African football and created an unforgettable experience.

documents.text:
Article: Riyad Mahrez Leads Golden Boot Race with 3 Goals
Date: 2026-01-01
Source: CAF AFCON 2025
Catégorie: statistics

Contenu:
Algeria's Riyad Mahrez is currently leading the race for the Golden Boot with 3 goals after the group stage. He is tied with Morocco's Ayoub El Kaabi and Brahim Díaz. The competition for top scorer promises to intensify as the knockout stages begin.

Mots-clés: CAN 2025, AFCON, Riyad Mahrez, Golden Boot, top scorer, Algeria

metadata.title: Riyad Mahrez Leads Golden Boot Race with 3 Goals
